\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 77922}

\subsection*{Load, Light, Toke.}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{Holydiver}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 & 4 hits & smoked & DMT & powder / crystals\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 120.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
There I was



White powder



Lights off



Bed made



I lit the lighter



The powder quickly became oil



The oil seeped into the wool



1

2

3

can I do it???



Yes I can I take the 4th cottony hit



4 Large hits through a bong



I hit the pillow



Impossible visions



I remember



Entities say hi



They say goodbye 



I am waking up



Reality is becoming clear again



DMT hyperspace is folding back into the 3d world I'm used to.



I'm being reborn.



Now I remember who I am.





But I forget how it feels to breakthrough



I forget about the impossabilitys.



And on my life goes



Load, Light, Toke, Remember, Forget.

\end{document}
